Supplier.description: Supplier/company issuing the processing temperature statement.

MaterialName.description: Material/raw material name covered by the statement.

MaterialCode.description: Identifier/code for the material if present (e.g., RM code).

IssueDate.description: Document issue date for the statement or guidance.

MaxRecommendedProcessingTempC.description: Maximum recommended processing temperature in °C. Parse numeric value; strip the 'C' symbol.

ShortTermToleranceTempC.description: Short-term exposure tolerance temperature in °C (higher threshold allowed briefly).

ShortTermToleranceDuration.description: Permitted duration for short-term exposure (e.g., '<= 60 minutes'). Preserve comparator symbols.

RecommendedAdditionTempC.description: Recommended addition temperature (°C) in process context (e.g., during emulsion cool-down).
